attributes.action: Rights to 12th night holiday period for schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This pertiton is for the rights of the traditional 12 days of Christmas holiday.

At the present time in the UK most schools return on the 3rd of January,
Uk parlimant returns after 12th night on the 7 of January

we want this holiday returned to the school calender Christmas is a busy exciting time for children and returning to school 2 days after new year is not fair, children are out of routine

Schools should restart on the 7 day of January
